metadata.title: CVE-2020-22083 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** jsonpickle through 1.4.1 allows remote code execution duringdeserialization of a malicious payload through the decode() function. Note:It has been argued that this is expected and clearly documented behaviour.pickle is known to be capable of causing arbitrary code execution, and mustnot be used with un-trusted data.

criterions.comment: jsonpickle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
